projects.name: GRNSight
projects.subtitle: Data Visualization
projects.description: A tool to visualize gene regulatory networks using D3.js. I worked on debugging the network display tool and improving the testing system, including the creation of an automatic test creation tool. I developed skills in working on large software with a team through online tools like Github and Zoom.

projects.name: Cubesat
projects.subtitle: Communication Engineering
projects.description: I designed and built the hardware and software for a groundstation. Built a multi-antenna network using Python and C++ and custom built an antenna to improve the system.

projects.name: Sursum Corda Website
projects.subtitle: Front-end Development
projects.description: Built a website for my service organization - Sursum Corda - to facilitate the sharing of information and help members sign up for volunteering oportunities.
projects.skills: React, Javascript, Interaction Design, Github, Bootstrap

projects.name: Automata Toolbox
projects.subtitle: Computer Theory
projects.description: A tool to simulate automata. It was built as the final project to my Automata / Theory of Computation class. The visualization portion of this software is pending
